attributes.action: allow the BBC to advertise allowing the removal of the TV liscense
attributes.additional_details:
Allow the BBC to advertise bringing it inline with the goverments competion program there for allowing the removal of the need for a tv liscense.
In present time when housholds are facing real problems this outdated means of funding a large organisation is no longer fair, most people watch other chanels but still have to pay this.
